metadata.title: RZ/A1 Group, RZ/A2M: Buffer memory for camera input and LCD output

sections.content:
Question:
Is it OK to place the buffer memory for camera input and LCD output in external RAM?
Answer:
Placement in external RAM is not recommended. Buffer memory for camera input and LCD output should be placed in internal RAM.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1H, RZ/A1M, RZ/A1L, RZ/A1LU, RZ/A1LC, RZ/A2M
